NAME: Name [text]
LABEL: Name
DESCRIPTION: Titles, identifying phrases, or names given to an archaeological space.

NAME: Project Associator [associator]
LABEL: None
DESCRIPTION: KORA identifier for the Project record that describes the overarching archaeological enterprise when this field research season or campaign took place.

NAME: Title [text]
LABEL: Title
DESCRIPTION: Title given to a particular physical configuration of the named project in an officially-defined short span of time

NAME: Type [multi-list]
LABEL: Research Activity
DESCRIPTION: Particular type of season (e.g. session, excavation, study). This fixed ARCS controlled vocabulary cannot be changed.

NAME: Director [multi-list]
LABEL: Director(s)
DESCRIPTION: Person(s) who bear responsibility for the execution of the season. Define local controlled vocabulary for each project.

NAME: Registrar [multi-list]
LABEL: Registrar(s)
DESCRIPTION: Person(s) in an official position responsible for accurately recording season data. Define local controlled vocabulary for each project.

NAME: Sponsor [multi-list]
LABEL: Sponsor(s)
DESCRIPTION: Entity/entities supporting the season. Define local controlled vocabulary for each project.

NAME: Contributor [list]
LABEL: Contributor(s)
DESCRIPTION: Person who participated in the project during this particular season. Define local controlled vocabulary for each project. List only 1 name in this field. Use Contributor 2, Contributor 3â€¦ for other people who contributed to the Season. Identify the role(s) this contributor played during this season in the Contributor Role field.

NAME: Contributor Role [multi-list]
LABEL: Contributor Role(s)
DESCRIPTION: Part or roles played by person identified in Contributor field. Define local controlled vocabulary for each project.

NAME: Earliest Date [date]
LABEL: Beginning of Season
DESCRIPTION: Earliest date associated with project activity in this particular season, expressed in yyyy/mm/dd format

NAME: Latest Date [date]
LABEL: End of Season
DESCRIPTION: Latest date associated with project activity in this particular season, expressed in yyyy/mm/dd format

NAME: Terminus Ante Quem [date]
LABEL: Earliest Cultural Activity
DESCRIPTION: Date at which the project location studied in this season begins to exhibit evidence of human activity.

NAME: Terminus Post Quem [date]
LABEL: Latest Cultural Activity
DESCRIPTION: Date at which the project location studied in this season ceases to exhibit evidence of human activity.

NAME: Description [text]
LABEL: Description of Season Activity
DESCRIPTION: Concise narrative outlining the season, its goals, duration, outputs, etc.

NAME: Orphan [list]
DESCRIPTION: Indicates that the Season record is not associated or linked to the appropriate Project record. This fixed ARCS controlled vocabulary cannot be changed.

NAME: Project Name
DESCRIPTION: Includes the name given to the project exactly as it is recorded in the Name field in the Project scheme. This will create a link between this Season record and the appropriate Project record it belongs to. This is redundant data for batch upload of records.
